thread.title_full: Candidates for Charleston City Council, District 7 - Post and Courier

author: postandcourier.com
text:
Joe Johnston Joe Johnston Age: 57
Residence: West Ashley
Occupation: Retired city of Charleston firefighter
Education: High school
 345-2477, westashleyjoe.com , and on Facebook at Joe Johnston for Charleston City Council
 I like to spend time with friends and ride my Harley.
 I am a longtime resident of West Ashley. I believe I can make a difference to the area with fresh and innovative ideas.
 West Ashley is being neglected. I will stand up for the area and hold developers and the city of Charleston accountable for their actions.
Keith Waring Age: 60
Residence: West Ashley
Occupation: Financial advisor and owner of financial planning firm
 banking and finance, University of South Carolina, licensed registered principal
 2011
Contact information: (843) 763-5388, Keith@KeithWaring.com , www.KeithWaring.com
 I spend quality time with family, sincere friends and fishing.
 I have served on City Council for 4 years. I serve on numerous community boards and on executive branches including the Charleston Metro Chamber of Commerce. Experience matters.
 Revitalization of West Ashley and Citadel Mall area. Beautification of main thoroughfares â€” Sam Rittenburg Boulevard, St. Andrews Boulevard and Savannah Highway. Complete Interstate 526. Comprehensive drainage plan for West Ashley. Housing Charlestonians can afford.
